Name: Ruby Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Wrigley "Oz" Osbourne at Goldbrick House in Bristol, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Ruby Daiquiri contains 185 calories
